p: The prevalence of DENV in our study was comparable to those seen in other studies conducted in the region. For example, the prevalence of DENV was reported to be 95.6% in Samoa, 83% in PNG, and 83–96% in French Polynesia [ 9, 10, 25]. These values were similar to those reported in Asian countries: Bangladesh 80–83.3% [ 26], the Philippines 79.2% [ 27], and Thailand 79.2% [ 28].
